results.title: Statins Improve Clinical Outcome After Non-aneurysmal Subarachnoid Hemorrhage: A Translational Insight From a Systematic Review of Experimental Studies
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patient@@@ characteristics such as statin-treatment (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 40 mg/d), the occurrence of @DISEASE_Vasospasm_Intracranial @DISEASE_MESH:D020301 @@@cerebral vasospasm@@@ (@DISEASE_Vasospasm_Intracranial @DISEASE_MESH:D020301 @@@CVS@@@), delayed @<m>DISEASE_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@infarction@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@DI@@@), delayed @DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@cerebral ischemia@@@ (@DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@DCI@@@), and clinical outcome were recorded.

results.title: Statin Therapy in Ischemic Stroke Models: A Meta-Analysis.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@ were most effective in reducing @<m>DISEASE_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@infarct@@@ volume when compared with @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ (p = 0.0475, p = 0.0004) and @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@ (p = 0.0036, p < 0.0001).

citations.NLM: Christophe B, Karatela M, Sanchez J, Pucci J, Connolly ES. Statin Therapy in Ischemic Stroke Models: A Meta-Analysis. Transl Stroke Res. 2020 Aug;11(4):590-600. PMID: 31788761
